metadata.title: CVE-2024-2609 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: The permission prompt input delay could have expired while the window isnot in focus, which made the prompt vulnerable to clickjacking by maliciouswebsites. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 124.

criterions.comment: thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
